ygData.subject: Re: Fury
ygData.msgSnippet: Stood up straight, displaying the sheer power he held, as he held his cannon up. Yes, I remember you Dominjoe. He turned around, and walked back a bit,

Stood up straight, displaying the sheer power he held, as he held his
cannon up. "Yes, I remember you Dominjoe." He turned around, and walked
back a bit, contemplating, both hands behind his back as he paced. He
then aproached again. His voice this time lost all emotion, and became
very serious. "As Cybertronians, you are superior to other creatures of
the Universe. Therefor it is our right, to rule them." Megatron said,
looking at Blindchaos. "The Autobots have failed to realize this,
therefor are classed in that inferior category. Never forget the glory
of what Cybertron should be." and as he finished that sentence he
stepped back, and held his hand up, "Hail Cybertron." he chanted. "And
Destruction to the Autobots."
